forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 45. Northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 27. North wind around 2 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston today, a generous embrace of sunshine unfolds beneath a clear aqua sky, bringing forth an invigorating crispness that outlines the beauty of autumn transitioning into winter. With temperatures poised around 45 degrees, the northwestern breeze gently whispers through the trees, creating a serene backdrop for those who venture outdoors. Tonight, the calm will persist as a chilly tranquillity settles in, inviting evenings of quiet contemplation under a starlit canopy with temperatures dropping to a cool 27.

Such agreeable conditions beckon the opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the Charles River Esplanade or perhaps a gentle amble through the winding paths of Boston Common, where the vibrancy of the season can be appreciated in the russet and golden hues of leaves carpeting the ground. Dressing in layers will ensure comfort—an inviting sweater or a light jacket, paired with a warm scarf to shield against the evening chill. With the sun arching high and the light playing among the skyscrapers, there’s no better time to savor a hot cup of coffee outside, embracing the beauty of a New England day.
